hillbillies.model.programs.statement

Interface Statement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignStatement, AttackStatement, BreakStatement, FollowStatement, IfStatement, MoveToStatement, SequenceStatement, WhileStatement, WorkStatement

    public interface Statement
    Interface for statements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default BreakChecker checkValid(BreakChecker breakChecker)
      Checks if the Statement is valid, returns the break checker it was passed.
      void execute(Task task)
      execute one step of the statement.
      boolean isDone(Task task) 
      void reset()
      reset the statement progress

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        void reset()
        reset the statement progress

      • isDone

        boolean isDone(Task task)

      • execute

        void execute(Task task)
      throws TaskErrorException,
             TaskInterruptException,
             BreakException
        execute one step of the statement.
        Throws:
        TaskErrorException - When the task has an unrecoverable error.
        TaskInterruptException - When the task needs to be interrupted and another unit may execute it.
        BreakException - When a while loop breaks, shouldn't happen in an valid program.

      • checkValid

        default BreakChecker checkValid(BreakChecker breakChecker)
        Checks if the Statement is valid, returns the break checker it was passed.
